findings.title: Best Practice Violation
findings.description: The function does not use the SafeERC20 library to check the result of ERC20 token transfers. Tokens may not follow the ERC20 standard and return a false value in case of transfer failure or not return any value at all.

findings.title: Best Practice Violation
findings.description: The total fees should not exceed the amount input variable. It is possible for the poolFee, promotersRewards, and oracleRewards variables to sum up to a value greater than the amount variable.

findings.title: Inconsistent Data
findings.description: The lastRewardEpoch value can be updated without updating accTokenPerShare, leading to incorrect calculations and potential imbalances.

findings.title: Inconsistent Data
findings.description: The lastRewardEpoch value can be updated externally without updating accTokenPerShare, leading to incorrect calculations and potential imbalances.

findings.title: Requirements Violation
findings.description: The code does not comply with the requirements provided by the Customer.

findings.title: 6. Requirements Violation
findings.description: The code does not comply with the requirements provided by the Customer.
